title: Beneath Him
description: **Revised,updated, and Re-released as of June 12,2015No matter how many times I try to stay away from him, he draws me back in. Jessica Grayson is a make-up artists in Dallas, Texas. During a photo shoot for a prestigious magazine, Jessica runs into an intense stranger who takes her breath away. The chemistry between them is consuming and hard to deny.Alex is a complicated and private man. Jessica has gotten under his skin, and he is determined to win her over despite her many attempts to keep things between them casual. They both have past regrets that should keep them apart, but neither has the willpower to deny the chemistry pulling them together. Can they escape their pasts or will it tear them apart?
author: C. Shell
